DOC.brief_summary: Pregnant woman increase risk back pain studied second trimester randomize to12-weeks resistance exercise , education waitlist . Several outcome assess include physical function , quality life mood .
DOC.detailed_description: A parallel group trial complete single site . Second trim woman ( n=134 ) randomly assign ( block 3 ) 12-weeks wait list , bi-monthly pregnancy education class twice weekly low-to-moderate intensity resistance training . Resistance train involve one abdominal exercise external load five exercise external load gradually progress ( leg extension , leg press , arm lat pull , leg curl , lumbar extension ) . Several outcome assess include physical function , quality life mood .
DOC.criteria: Pregnant able complete baseline test gestational week 21 25 pregnancy . Regular resistance exercise training ( â‰¥ twice per week past month ) orthopedic cardiovascular limitation psychiatric disorder current prior pregnancy follow : two miscarriage premature labor placental previa , poor fetal growth , low prepregnancy body weight ( BMI < 17.5 ) multiple birth pregnancy preeclampsia preterm rupture membrane uterine growth retardation incompetent cervix/cerclage recurrent vaginal bleeding anemia diabetes .
